title:
Higher topological complexity of planar polygon spaces having small
  genetic codes
authors: Sutirtha Datta, Navnath Daundkar and Abhishek Sarkar
abstract:
In this paper, we compute sharp bounds for the higher topological complexity
of many planar polygon spaces having small genetic codes. In most of these
cases we show that the $k$-th higher topological complexity of planar polygon
spaces is either $km$ or $km+1$, where $m$ is their dimension.
